item.title: Create Lab from scratch on Rocky linux 9
item.description: Step 1: Download rocky linux 9 Download rocky linux 9 from following repository: Rocky Linux download repository Step 2: Install dependencies Remove Rocky default repository and Isfahan university repos: rm -rf /etc/yum.repos.d/* cd /etc/yum.repos.d curl -O repo.iut.ac.ir/repo/iutrocky9.repo curl -O repo.iut.ac.ir/repo/iutepel9.repo dnf update Install following dependencies: dnf install vim gpm dhclient nano tar bzip2 kernel-headers kernel-devel open-vm-tools Install Virutlabox extensions: mount /dev/sr0 /mnt cd /mnt ./VBoxLinuxAdditions.run Step 3: Disable firewall Disable firewall:
